## ElementController.removeBehavior() method

Removes the behavior from the component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
removeBehavior(behavior: HostBehavior<TElement>, force?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

behavior


</td><td>

[HostBehavior](../fast-element.hostbehavior/)<!-- -->&lt;TElement&gt;


</td><td>

The behavior to remove.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

force


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Forces removal even if this behavior was added more than once.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

void
